Elves.name: Elves
Elves.physique: Usually taller and more slender than humans, agile, with pointed ears and sharp facial features. Skin tones range from pale silver to deep forest green, to charcoal black depending on subrace.
Elves.other_regions: Widely spread across Sylvarus, second only to humans - usually stays on the western continent
Elves.history: Elves are believed to be among the first sentient species to walk the world, shaped from song and moonlight by a forgotten celestial being. Their early history is closely tied to the Feywild.
Elves.religion: Primarily worship deities of nature, stars, and the arcane. Many venerate moon gods or goddesses.
Elves.traditions: Seasonal festivals, moon rites, coming-of-age vision quests.
Elves.relationships: Tense history with Dwarves due to resource disputes; relatively peaceful with Humans.
